mapper.insert: INSERT INTO system_organization (id, org_name, org_code, description, status, create_time, deleted) VALUES (#{id}, #{orgName}, #{orgCode}, #{description}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE system_organization SET org_name = #{orgName}, org_code = #{orgCode}, description = #{description}, status = #{status}, deleted = #{deleted}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, org_name, org_code, description, status, create_time, deleted FROM system_organization WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, org_name, org_code, description, status, create_time, deleted FROM system_organization WHERE org_name = #{name}
SELECT id, org_name, org_code, description, status, create_time, deleted FROM system_organization WHERE org_code = #{code}
SELECT id, org_name, org_code, description, status, create_time, deleted FROM system_organization WHERE deleted = 0
